description: composite purchase order with dereferenced/expanded orders fields
a completely de-referenced purchase order, complete with ALL relevant details

adjustment.description: the adjustment record associated with this order

approved.description: whether or not the purchase order has been approved

assigned_to.description: UUID of the user this purchase order his assigned to

created.description: date/time when this purchase order was created

created_by.description: UUID of the user this purchase order was created by

notes.description: free-form notes associated with this purchase order

po_number.description: A human readable ID assigned to this purchase order

re_encumber.description: indicates this purchase order should be re-encumbered each fiscal year. Only applies to ongoing orders

total_estimated_price.description: total estimated price of this purchase order

total_items.description: total number of items included in the purchase order

workflow_status.description: the workflow status for this purchase order

po_lines.description: a list of completely de-referenced purchase order lines
